images.name: This are both pulleys and idlers you can use a 5mm skateboard bearing

lineitems.name: GT2 PULLEY
lineitems.comments: The GT2 pulley with 16 teeth or grooves is one of the best choices for 3d printer construction. Compared with the T2.5 or MXL timing pulley, the GT2 pulley tooth profile is anti-backlash. Why? The rounded teeth of this tooth and belt are engaged together longer providing a smoother transition between teeth. Suitable for GT2 -6 mm belt. Also available at AliExpress
